BatchApplyAccountBaselines.document: This API is used to apply baselines to existing accounts in batches.
BatchApplyAccountBaselines.name: Applies baselines to existing accounts in batches

members.document: A unique identifier for an Account Factory baseline item, which can only contain English letters, digits, and @,._[]-:()+=. It must be 2-128 characters long.Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: Identifier

members.document: Account Factory baseline item configuration. Different items have different parameters.Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: Configuration

members.document: Member account UIN, which is also the UIN of the account to which the baseline is applied.
members.name: MemberUinList

members.document: List of baseline item configuration information.
members.name: BaselineConfigItems

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId
